snippet.title: Fly. Die. Cry.  Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Are you old school? Longing for the days of simplicity and arcades? Plagued by a goldfish-like attention span?
Fly. Die. Cry. might be for you…if you can remember to download it :) Get it for free at App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1145761703 Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bekindgames.nolimit
